activities: Transfer of data to Nintendo of America Inc. (which is located in the United States) from Nintendo of Europe GmbH and any of its subsidiaries or customers as well as Nintendo's European independent distributors, affiliates and business partners. This data shall be transferred to and stored in the United States under Nintendo's control. Nintendo uses such information to process online transactions (sales and other), operate and service various activities (websites, development portals, gaming, messaging and other), conduct marketing and analysis, address anti-piracy enforcement activities, provide customer service, complete product registration and provide storage of consumer data.
contactoff1: Legal Dept., Nintendo of America Inc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer and Business Partners On-Line, Off-Line and Manually Processed
privacyprograms: Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Privacy Certified
recoursemech: Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) dispute resolution mechanism
